arts.ttl: Chelsea suffer early injury blow as star is forced off after just FIVE minutes of Champions League clash with Qarabag
arts.sum: The Belgian midfielder, making just his fourth start of the season, pulled up in visible discomfort before being replaced by Moises Caicedo.

arts.ttl: Chelsea make trip to Azerbaijan for Qarabag test - live updates
arts.sum: With seven new faces tonight, Chelsea have now made 85 changes to their starting XIs in all competitions this season

arts.ttl: Qarabag v Chelsea: Champions League – live
arts.sum: ⚽️ Champions League updates, 5.45pm GMT kick-off ⚽️ Live scores | Chelsea’s epic trek to Qarabag | Mail John The Tofiq Bahramov Republican Stadium is named after what we in England for decades called “the Russian linesman” from the 1966 World Cup final. He was, of course, from Azerbaijan, back then part of the USSR. Baku’s other stadium was where Chelsea won the Europa League, with Eden Hazard waving goodbye to the club, and sadly his career. What a player he was, by the way. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Chelsea slam racist abuse in Qarabag UEFA Youth League clash and demand response
arts.sum: Chelsea's UEFA Youth League game against Qarabag was suspended after the Blues' Under-19s side were allegedly subjected to racist abuse

arts.ttl: Qarabag vs Chelsea live: Blues head to Azerbaijan for tricky Champions League test
arts.sum: Chelsea continue their Champions League campaign after a long journey to Baku

arts.ttl: How to Watch Qarabag vs. Chelsea on TV, Live Stream
arts.sum: Chelsea are looking to climb the Champions League table by beating Qarabağ.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca expects a ‘tough game’ against Qarabag
arts.sum: Qarabag, I just said, they won two or three games like us in the Premier League . They beat Benfica, they beat Copenhagen, they were winning against Athletic Club and then at the end they lost.

arts.ttl: Chelsea bidding to extend abysmal Qarabag streaks in Champions League game
arts.sum: Chelsea will be bidding to extend a number of abysmal Qarabag streaks when the clubs square off in Wednesday's Champions League fixture in Baku.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca must decide to stick or twist on Chelsea’s epic Qarabag trek
arts.sum: Finding the right balance with rotation will be key as head coach faces tricky Champions League task on Wednesday European away days were not so taxing for Chelsea last season. They were too good for the Conference League and were able to win it even though Enzo Maresca often used those Thursday assignments to play his reserves and keep his best players fresh for the Premier League. This time, though, the physical demands are tougher. Competing in the Champions League has been more sapping and Maresca has to work out how to strike the right balance when his team face Qarabag at the Tofiq Bahramov Republican Stadium on Wednesday evening, in their fourth game of the league phase. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Qarabag vs. Chelsea: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: Azerbaijan is the venue for the Blues’ fourth game of the Champions League league phase.
